sentences.en: Biting endlessly the life tree, which is for our temporary inhabit.
sentences.cn: 不停地正用力咬着我们暂时栖身的生活之树.

sentences.en: Exercising smart power begins with realistic assessments of the world we inhabit.
sentences.cn: 运用明智的实力要从实事求是地评估我们生活的世界入手.

sentences.en: Furthermore, characters on some popular network sitcoms inhabit all - white worlds.
sentences.cn: 此外, 一些深受欢迎的电视情景喜剧中的人物都是清一色的白人.

sentences.en: Many forms of aquatic life inhabit ponds.
sentences.cn: 有很多种水生动植物均栖居于池塘.

sentences.en: One does not inhabit a country; one inhabits a language.
sentences.cn: 人不居住在城市中, 人居住在语言里.

sentences.en: Only rare birds and animals inhabit this remote island.
sentences.cn: 这个偏远的岛屿上只有一些珍禽异兽.

sentences.en: some of the rare species that inhabit the area
sentences.cn: 生活在这个地区的一些罕见物种

sentences.en: Such mammals as dolphins, whales, seals inhabit the sea.
sentences.cn: 像海豚 、 鲸鱼 、 海豹一类哺乳动物均栖息于大海之中.

sentences.en: The woods are inhabited by many wild animals.
sentences.cn: 很多野生动物栖居在这片森林里。

sentences.en: They inhabit reed huts built on stilts above the water.
sentences.cn: 他们住在建于水中木桩之上的芦苇草屋里。
他们居住在热带森林中.

sentences.en: They only look as if they inhabit our galaxy.
sentences.cn: 他们仅仅看起来好像他们居住在我们的银河系.
各种思想占据了他的心灵.

sentences.en: Wild tribes still inhabit part of the Philippines.
sentences.cn: 菲律宾部分地区仍然居住着一些原始部落.
啄木鸟栖息在中空的树中.
啄木鸟栖息在中空的树中。

words.tran_cn: 适于居住的；可居住的，可栖居的
居住，住所；有人居住的状态
占据（inhabit的过去分词）；居住于

trans.tran_en: if animals or people inhabit an area or place, they live there
